des: "This is easy, delicious and a huge hit a parties. Everyone always asks for the recipe! Mushrooms are marinated in a zesty oil and vinegar mixture. Adjust the amount of mushrooms so that all are covered in liquid while marinating."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the blue cheese, vegetable oil, lemon juice, white wine vinegar, garlic, seasoning salt, white sugar, dry mustard and hot sauce. Stir in the mushrooms. Cover and refrigerate 4 to 6 hours before serving.
